mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Interview (company, jobId, resumeId, userId, date) VALUES (#{company}, #{jobId}, #{resumeId}, #{userId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT jobId FROM Interview WHERE interviewId = #{interviewId}
SELECT i.interviewId, i.company, i.jobId, f.job, i.resumeId, i.date AS createdAt, i.userId FROM Interview i JOIN Field f ON i.jobId = f.jobId WHERE i.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY i.date DESC
